comment.author: 92581505@N02
comment._content: The Pensioners' Baracks Arch still stands surrounded by St Georges Terrace, Elder St, and Mitchell Freeway. The rest of the structure was demolished to make way for the Freeway.

comment.author: 92558352@N05
comment._content: i believe that the gates from the barracks arch are located at the fremantle arts centre.

comment.author: 33364206@N05
comment._content: My father-in-law took photos from the top of Dumas house during the demolition of the barracks for the construction of the freeway.  One photo shows only half of the barracks remaining.
